00024 #ifndef _ISOTOPETABLE_HPP_
00025 #define _ISOTOPETABLE_HPP_
00026 
00027 
00028 #include "Chemistry.hpp"
00029 
00030 
00031 namespace pwiz {
00032 namespace proteome {
00033 
00034 
00035 /// Class representing a table of isotope distributions for collections of multiple
00036 /// atoms of a single element; the table is computed on instantiation, based on the 
00037 /// element's mass distribution, a maximum atom count, and abundance cutoff value.
00038 class IsotopeTable
00039 {
00040     public:
00041 
00042     IsotopeTable(const Chemistry::MassDistribution& md, int maxAtomCount, double cutoff); 
00043     ~IsotopeTable();
00044 
00045     Chemistry::MassDistribution distribution(int atomCount) const;
00046 
00047     private:
00048     class Impl;
00049     std::auto_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00050 
00051     // no copying
00052     IsotopeTable(const IsotopeTable&);
00053     IsotopeTable& operator=(const IsotopeTable&);
00054 
00055     /// debugging
00056     friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const IsotopeTable& isotopeTable);
00057 };
00058 
00059 
00060 } // namespace proteome
00061 } // namespace pwiz
00062 
00063 
00064 #endif // _ISOTOPETABLE_HPP_
